product_name: Spenco 2nd Skin AquaHeal Hydrogel Bandages - Package of 6
long_description: The Spenco 2nd Skin AquaHeal Hydrogel bandages are perfect for minor burns, scrapes, cuts, bites and blisters. The transparent bandages let you watch your wound heal. Contains three 2.2 x 1 in. Hydrogel bandages and three 3 x 1.75 in. bandages. Hydrogel bandages provide relief by soothing and cooling wounds; bandages keep bacteria out and provide light cushion.
short_description: The Spenco 2nd Skin AquaHeal Hydrogel bandages are perfect for minor burns, scrapes, cuts, bites and blisters. The transparent bandages let you watch your wound heal.
